column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////All of the positive comments about the food and atmosphere are correct. There were 4 of us and we shared oysters
column4: filet and salmon. The restaurant is beautiful and the music so varied. We brought our own wine and had no corkage because we shared a glass with another table. We only received 1 glass back and we were disappointed that the server did not mention anything about that. Just took the glass of wine away. My biggest disappointment was when I asked for the salmon to be split in the kitchen. It was not and I was given a bread/salad dish for my entree and everyone else had a full size plate. Same thing happened with the salad. At a restaurant of that quality and price the patrons should not be serving and splitting their own meal.
